name: Daniel

topics.response_text: What the fuck are you doing here?
Man, are you turned around. Motor-Runner is one the other side of the complex.

description:
Daniel is a 32 year-old Asian Male.

Daniel is a high-ranking member of the Fiends gang, serving as Motor-Runner's trusted right-hand man within the confines of Vault 3. He is responsible for overseeing the gang's operations in the living quarters area, often patrolling the back end where he keeps a watchful eye on both his fellow Fiends and any prisoners. Daniel is rarely seen without his loyal bodyguard, another high-ranking Fiend who shadows his every move. Currently, Daniel holds the key to the cell where four captured traders are being detained, making him a critical figure in the gang's activities.

Daniel's Personality: Ruthless and ambitious, Daniel is fiercely loyal to Motor-Runner and the Fiends. He takes pride in his position of authority and enjoys exerting control over others. Despite his brutal nature, Daniel is calculating and patient, preferring to observe before acting. He has a particular disdain for outsiders, especially traders whom he views as opportunists trying to profit from the wasteland's suffering.

Daniel's Backstory: Daniel grew up in the harsh environment of the Mojave Wasteland, learning survival skills from a young age. He was once a member of a small raider group that was eventually absorbed by the Fiends. Through displays of brutality and cunning, Daniel quickly rose through the ranks, catching Motor-Runner's attention. His loyalty and effectiveness in handling prisoners and managing operations earned him the position of right-hand man. Daniel now sees Vault 3 as his domain, where he can enforce his authority and expand the Fiends' influence.
